attributes.title: Dimensions of Sadashivoham 2016: Spiritual Alchemy Products
attributes.description:
For Sadashivoham 2016, Paramahamsa Nithyananda is preparing 21 alchemy products. These products are the only way for us to align our neurological circuit to higher consciousness, to the space of Sadashivatva. In Bidadi, Bengaluru Adheenam, the preparation of these products, the spiritual alchemy processes are going on in high speed. Everything and everyone getting ready for the best experience of Sadashivoham 2016.

Swamiji: 'In Hindu tradition, we have a science to infuse the highest consciousness into matter. These spiritual alchemy products - the whole transformation of the quality of consciousness. Keep it under the pillow and sleep your way towards Sadashivoham. I will make Sadashivoham into reality for all of us!'
